exercises.title: Basic Superposition
exercises.description: Create an equal superposition state |+⟩ = (|0⟩ + |1⟩)/√2 using a single Hadamard gate
hints: Use a Hadamard gate on qubit 0
The Hadamard gate creates equal superposition

exercises.title: Bell State Creation
exercises.description: Create a Bell state |Φ+⟩ = (|00⟩ + |11⟩)/√2 showing quantum entanglement
hints: Start with a Hadamard gate on the first qubit
Use a CNOT gate to create entanglement
The target state should have equal amplitudes for |00⟩ and |11⟩

exercises.title: Probability Challenge
exercises.description: Create a quantum state where measuring gives |0⟩ with 75% probability and |1⟩ with 25% probability
hints: Think about the relationship between amplitudes and probabilities
You might need rotation gates like RY
